system.description:
You have woven the power of your artifact and your bond with the wilds into a potent and unique whole. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Strength, Wisdom or wielder spellcasting ability score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

  • Half of your wielder levels count as druid levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.zvtlcriqwdlzar7u]{Ferocity or Serentiy} feature.

  • Half of your druid levels count as wielder levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.ukdth285bnj3w3qc]{Relic's Focus} feature

  • Your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.i6yg9jmich8u6jjx]{Bonded Artifact's} connection to nature strengthens:

    • If your bonded artifact is an @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.l97xnqcpxnc12jpo]{Armor of Power}, when you finish a long rest, select acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder. You have resistance to the selected damage type until you begin a long rest. If you are already resistant or immune to one of these damage types, you cannot select that one. 

    • If your bonded artifact is a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.00ein6jo2oc0asex]{Font of Power}, you gain an additional cantrip from the druid list, which does not count against your druid cantrips known.

    • If your bonded artifact is a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.uga2gmf3559332tw]{Weapon of Power}, you learn a maneuver of a degree you could learn from the combat tradition you gained from @UUID[Compendium.a5e-mmv2.mmv2-features.Item.TmlAje1AuLxDmQ8F]{Primordial Attendant}. It does not count against your maneuvers known.
